hero.title: VISUAL AGENTS ARE HERE

features.revolutionaryDesc: Our AI understands natural language and context, enabling you to build complex interfaces with simple voice commands. Perfect for real estate professionals and beyond.
features.voiceExample: Create a profile page with a 3D avatar

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: Our LLM-powered visual agents transform how you interact with digital interfaces. Currently revolutionizing real estate workflows while building the foundation for universal visual AI.

neuralProcessing.title: Neural Processing
neuralProcessing.description: Our AI processes voice commands with precise understanding of intent and context.

realTimeRendering.title: Real-time Rendering
realTimeRendering.description: See your changes instantly with our ultrafast rendering engine.

adaptiveInterfaces.title: Adaptive Interfaces
adaptiveInterfaces.description: UI components that learn from your preferences and adapt automatically.

cta.title: Ready to build your own Visual Agent?
